dmca_clarifications: These images were used to promote these designs on a  
forum, bringing potential financial gain to the designer of the cross  
stitch chart. They are not charts or scans of charts and are not stitchable  
from. There is no breach of copyright as they were the images provided by  
the designer for marketing and can be viewed on other websites including  
distributors and shops. If the designer does not wish me to promote their  
work to stitchers then this will be noted and I will not bring them to the  
attention of the forum again.
